Who is project Marie

"Marie" is an award winning architecture firm made up of husband and wife team Marie Doe and John Doe. Before forming Marie, John and Marie followed largely independent but parallel career paths, with each making significant contributions to internationally recognized architecture firms in both Scandinavia and the United States: Derk Architects, Rina Ben Shimol, Wilmer Coronado Castillo, Deichmann, Vingan Razvan and Leddy Maytum Stacy.

An opportunity to work together with Rick Joy brought them to Stockholm, Sweden in 2003 where they fell in love with the nature, later establishing Marie. Marie believes in the power of thoughtful design to enrich life, and views every project as an opportunity to create something meaningful.
